Reference

Build

Build, check, test and upload

module_build()

Build a module

module_check()

Check names and structure of a module

module_identities()

Return identities for a module

module_skeleton()

Generate a skeleton for a module

module_test()

Test an outsider module

module_travis()

Generate Travis-CI file (GitHub only)

module_upload()

Upload a module to code sharing site and DockerHub

Docker, git

Convinence functions

docker_build()

Build a Docker image

docker_cmd()

Send commands to Docker

docker_login()

Login to Docker

docker_push()

Push a Docker image to Docker Hub

git_upload()

Upload module to code-sharing service

Private

Internal functions

celebrate()

Say nice things

comfort()

Say consoling things

description_get()

Return DESCRIPTION

examples_get()

Determine examples

examples_test()

Run each example of an outsider module

file_create()

Create file

outsider.devtools

outsider.devtools: Build 'outsider' Modules

Read the package description

pkgnm_get()

remote_git_exists()

Does a remote git repo exist

string_replace()

templates_get()

Test a module

yaml_get()

Return om.yml
